alert.note: Alert for Hall; Lumpkin; Towns; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 6:19AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Towns, eastern Lumpkin, White, north central Hall and east central Union Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 619 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Garland, or near Dahlonega, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Cleveland, Helen, Unicoi State Park, Whitley Gap Shelter, Robertstown, Blue Mountain Shelter, Brasstown Bald, Mossy Creek, Mountain Scene, Low Gap Shelter, Camp Coleman Lake, Anna Ruby Falls, Garland, Leaf, Smithgall Woods Conservation Are, Porter Springs, Turners Corner, Sautee and Qualatchee Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
